data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Arwal to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Arwal, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Arwal, Bihar, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary: On average, 56 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Arwal, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Arwal, Bihar, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Arwal.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Laheri (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Laheri (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Laheri (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Arwal, Bihar, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Arwal that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 7,710 believers in the county of Arwal into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

location.name: Arwal
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Dikhit, Atishbaz, Beldar Lonari (Hindu traditions), Mukeri, Lohar Kamti
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput Dikhit (263,000), Atishbaz (3,400), Beldar Lonari (Hindu traditions) (53,000), Mukeri (32,000), Lohar Kamti (3,800)
